alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 8:35PM CST until February 16 at 1:31AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Hale and Marengo Counties. .Heavy rainfall over the past several days is producing rises on the Black Warrior River. Another statement will be issued by Monday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Monday night to Wednesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 84.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 91.2 feet Tuesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
